title: How much is the Beatles Help album worth? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what condition its in, and what version  you have. Assuming you have the original 1965 MONO Parlophone release PMC1255 you could get at least 200 Euros for it (using current prices on the Discogs marketplace) assuming its in Mint or Near Mint condition Help! (Vinyl) at Discogs Marketplace However if its not in such good condition, it might be worth only 5 -10 Euros. Its not a record that is in any way rare, so it needs to be in excellent condition There are other versions of the release that can be valuable too. For example the first pressing of the French release "Chansons Du Film "Help!"  Help! (Vinyl) at Discogs Marketplace

Depends on the condition but in good condition about $20.00….this is a popular album that had millions of records pressed. If you have a rare copy of Sgt. Pepper Lonely Hearts Club Band with the photos of the executives from Capital Records is worth about $175,000. Only 100 pressed as gifts to the staff. If your album has Gandhi, Bette Davis & Albert Einstein it may be worth some money since they were cutout or obscured by other figures. Go check your copies…..
